meta.title: OLD WORLD NEON | Fables Monster Studio
meta.description: A classified cyberpunk RPG project shrouded in mystery.

hero.taglineFallback: Rain-slicked neon streets hide corporate secrets. Those who ask too many questions tend to disappear into the digital void.
hero.descriptionFallback: More details will be revealed when the time is right. Follow our channels for updates.

teaser.paragraph1: Neon signs flicker in the perpetual rain. Corporate towers pierce the smog-choked sky. In the shadows between the light, deals are made, lives are bought, and secrets are buried.
teaser.paragraph2: You're just another piece on the board. But even pawns can topple kings... if they know which wires to cut.

urbanSprawl.title: URBAN SPRAWL
urbanSprawl.description: Navigate a city where every street corner hides danger and opportunity in equal measure.

digitalWarfare.title: DIGITAL WARFARE
digitalWarfare.description: Hack systems, steal data, and erase your tracks before the corps trace you back.

highStakesHeists.title: HIGH-STAKES HEISTS
highStakesHeists.description: Plan the job, assemble your crew, and pray your tech doesn't glitch at the worst moment.
